title: Magnificent Peacock Kundan Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
features: This regal haaram showcases exquisite Kundan craftsmanship, a hallmark of Hyderabadi jewelry. The design features gracefully intertwined peacocks (Mayura) symbolizing beauty and prosperity, adorned with vibrant emeralds and a central ruby. Delicate pearl drops (muthyalu) enhance its traditional charm. The pendant (gundla haram) features an intricate floral mandala design mirroring the neckline's opulence.
colors: with striking accents of green (emerald) and red (ruby)
complemented by the soft luster of the pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaaham)
and important family functions (Shubha karyamulu). An ideal heirloom piece for generations to cherish.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry, combining the grandeur of Kundan setting with the auspicious symbolism of peacocks and the timeless elegance of pearls. Its meticulous craftsmanship and premium materials ensure lasting beauty and value. A true statement piece that reflects impeccable taste and cultural heritage.
